stat.title: Statistics
stat.more100: The ideas shown on the graph are the most recent 100 ideas. Please feel free to adjust it using the Date of Submission filter.

my.firstComment: Be the first to write a comment...
my.noFile: There is no file attached yet. To attach files to demonstrate your idea, you can edit it now.

new.fullPartial: Search by full or partial match tags
new.tagDescription: You can search for full matching tags to see ideas that contain each one of them, or partial matches to see ideas that contain any of the selected tags.

modal.emptyDescription: Please add description to your idea.
modal.withoutEnter: Remember to press "enter" to add a tag.
modal.largeTtm: Maximum value allowed in this field is 300.
modal.errorCost: Value exceeds maximum allowed value (10,000,000). Please input a new number with smaller value.
modal.errorProfit: Value exceeds maximum allowed value (100,000,000). Please input a new number with smaller value.
modal.blankCommentError: Please add content to the comment field.
modal.title: Idea Title
modal.clickTags: (Click on tag to set as main)
modal.dropArea: Drop files here or click to upload
modal.tellMore: Tell more about what you suggest
modal.addTopic: Add some topics that are covered
modal.tagAdd: You can add tags by typing the tag you wish to add and press “Enter”. The first tag will be main tag.
modal.specifyTag: You should specify at least one tag
modal.fileLarge: The file you tried to upload is too large. Upload files up to 3MB.
modal.incorrectEmailPassword: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please check and correct your login details or reset the password.
modal.emailNotFound: The email you entered is not found. Make sure the entered address is correct.
modal.skipFile: You can skip this step or demonstrate your idea by attaching some files to it.
modal.uploadFiles: Upload files up to 3 MB in a supported formats: .pdf, .jpg, .png, .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx.
modal.backToTime: Back to time, cost, and profit
modal.checkSubmission: Now you can check your submission, return and edit id needed, or go ahead and submit your idea.
modal.uploadWait: Please wait for all attachments to be saved.

auth.confirmVerifyEmail: Verification email has been re-sent. Please check your email.
auth.noComEmail: Email address does not belong to the organization. Please sign up with your company email.
auth.accountNotVerifiedBeforeLine1: To log in to your account, please verify your email first.
auth.accountNotVerifiedBeforeLine2: Didn't received the verification email? Click
auth.emailExist: Account with this email address already exists. Please try to login or register with a different email.
auth.confirmHint: Enter the same password as above
auth.createDesc: Create your account to share, view, vote, and comment on ideas.
auth.enter: Enter to your account and continue to ideate.
auth.title: Log in to your IDEX Account
auth.note: Your account is your portal to all things!

error.passwordNotLong: Password must be 8 characters or longer.
error.loginError: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please check and correct your login details or reset the password.

resets.email: Enter the email address you provided during registration.
resets.emailSent: An email with a link to reset your password has been sent to your email address.
resets.canNew: Now you can create a new password and login into your account.
resets.codeBack: Click here to login when done.
resets.resetBack: Click here to login with your new credentials.

register.emailSent: A verification email has been sent to you. Please go to your inbox to confirm your email.

add_member.gen_link_description: Generate a link to invite new members. Please note, anyone with the link can sign up as a member of your corporation. Link will be active for 30 days.
add_member.add_email: Input or paste an email address, or multiple emails with comma separators. New members will receive an email with a link to sign up.
add_member.anyone_can_sign: Anyone with an email address containing your domain can sign up to the app.
add_member.multi_invalid: One or more emails is not valid. Please check your entry.
add_member.domain_error: The domain name you entered seems to be invalid.
add_member.delete_domain: Are you sure you want to delete active domain?
add_member.revoke_invitation: Are you sure you want to revoke invitation?

user_mngt.name: Name
user_mngt.change_name_after: ’s account role. Please confirm your choice for the changes to take effect.
user_mngt.sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete %{name}'s account
user_mngt.sure_delete_all: Are you sure you want to delete selected accounts?

corporate_settings.upload_instructions: You can upload files with your company logo up to 1000*1000 px size in compatible formats such as .svg, .png, .eps, .pdf.
corporate_settings.main_logo_description: Logo that will be in IDEX app (light colors).
corporate_settings.secondary_logo_description: Logo that will be in emails (dark colors).
corporate_settings.secondary_logo_instructions: Make sure that your logo is on a transparent background and will be visible on background color. ⍰
corporate_settings.color1_description: Primary color for buttons, tags and actions components in app.
corporate_settings.color2_description: Contrast background color for navigation in app.
corporate_settings.color3_description: Secondary background color for cards and headers in app.
corporate_settings.title: Title
corporate_settings.title_description: Customize the page title to be displayed in the web browser.
corporate_settings.favicon_description: Icon that will will be displayed in a browser tab. Max size 16*16 px in compatible formats as .png, .gif, or .ico.
corporate_settings.email_greeting: Greetings, you have been invited to join IDEX.
corporate_settings.email_description: John Doe has invited you to join IDEX - a community of coworkers creating actionable ideas each day.
corporate_settings.email_body: After you have signed up, you can start sharing your ideas and evaluating various innovations from the other members. Please note that this invitation is good for only 30 days, after which it expires.
corporate_settings.email_link-instructions: If the above button doesn't work, just follow the below link to sign up:
corporate_settings.color_picker_description: Change colors regarding your corporate setting by entering new HEX-code.
corporate_settings.logo_instructions_text: Primary and background colors you can customize in color settings section.
corporate_settings.confirm_clear_palette: Please confirm you wish to clear the color palette
corporate_settings.currency_description: Choose a currency that applies to your entire Innovation Management System. Please note, previously entered amounts will not be converted to the corresponding amount in the new currency, i.e., 10,000 USD would become 10,000 CNY, not 70,000 CNY.

helpplaceholder: Let us know how we can help
asap: Thank you for your message. We will contact you as soon as possible.
howhelp: Let us know if you have any questions or suggestions, we could be more than happy to help you!
getback: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
